sn56.40:1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe…
sn56.40:1.2: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati, puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya samano va brahmano va vadatthiko vadagavesi:
sn56.40:1.3: ‘vadamassa aropessami’ti, tam vata sahadhammena sankampessati va sampakampessati va sampacalessati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
sn56.40:1.6: dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya samano va brahmano va vadatthiko vadagavesi:
sn56.40:1.7: ‘vadamassa aropessami’ti, tam vata sahadhammena sankampessati va sampakampessati va sampacalessati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
sn56.40:2.2: Tassassu attha kukku hettha nemangama, attha kukku uparinemassa.
sn56.40:2.3: Puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaleyya; pacchimaya cepi disaya …pe… uttaraya cepi disaya …pe… dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaleyya.
sn56.40:2.6: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo hi koci bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati;
sn56.40:2.7: puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya samano va brahmano va vadatthiko vadagavesi ‘vadamassa aropessami’ti, tam vata sahadhammena sankampessati va sampakampessati va sampacalessati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
sn56.40:2.10: dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya samano va brahmano va vadatthiko vadagavesi: ‘vadamassa aropessami’ti, tam vata sahadhammena sankampessati va sampakampessati va sampacalessati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
sn56.40:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
